tool_description: Get instant access to 140+ million property records, owner details, home value and rent estimates, active listings and rental market statistics with the Realty Mole real estate data API. Available nationwide in the US.
title: Realty Mole Property

api_list.name: Property Rental Listings
api_list.description: Search for rental listings in a geographical area or around a specific location. Returns the listed rent, date, property features, and other listing information. [More info.](https://rapidapi.com/realtymole/api/realty-mole-property-api/details)

optional_parameters.name: state
optional_parameters.description: The two-character state abbreviation, used to search for listings in a specific state

optional_parameters.name: status
optional_parameters.description: The current listing status, used to search for listings matching this criteria. Supported values are: `Active`, `Inactive`

optional_parameters.name: daysOld
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of days since a property was listed on the market, with a minimum of 1

optional_parameters.name: bedrooms
optional_parameters.description: The number of bedrooms, used to search for listings matching this criteria

optional_parameters.name: propertyType
optional_parameters.description: The type of the property, used to search for listings matching this criteria. Supported values are: `Single Family`, `Condo`, `Townhouse`, `Manufactured`, `Duplex-Triplex`, `Apartment`

optional_parameters.name: latitude
optional_parameters.description: The latitude of the search area. Use the `latitude`/`longitude` and `radius` parameters to search for listings in a specific area

optional_parameters.name: zipCode
optional_parameters.description: The 5-digit zip code, used to search for listings in a specific zip code

optional_parameters.name: bathrooms
optional_parameters.description: The number of bathrooms, used to search for listings matching this criteria. Supports fractions to indicate partial bathrooms

optional_parameters.name: address
optional_parameters.description: The address of the property, in the format of 'Street, City, State, Zip'. Used to retrieve data for a specific property, or together with the `radius` parameter to search for listings in a specific area

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of listings to return, between 1 and 500. Defaults to 50 if not provided

optional_parameters.name: radius
optional_parameters.description: The radius of the search area, in kilometers. Use in combination with the `latitude`/`longitude` or `address` parameters to search for listings in a specific area

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The index of the first listing to return, used to paginate through large lists of results. Defaults to 0 if not provided

optional_parameters.name: city
optional_parameters.description: The name of the city, used to search for listings in a specific city

optional_parameters.name: longitude
optional_parameters.description: The longitude of the search area. Use the `latitude`/`longitude` and `radius` parameters to search for listings in a specific area

body.rawAddress: 9815 Copper Creek Dr Unit 31925, Austin, Texas 78729
body.formattedAddress: 9815 Copper Creek Dr, Unit 31925, Austin, TX 78729

api_list.name: Property Rental Listing by Id
api_list.description: Returns a single property rental listing matching the specified id, if it exists. Property ids can be obtained via the `/properties`, `/saleListings` or `/rentalListings` endpoints. [More info.](https://rapidapi.com/realtymole/api/realty-mole-property-api/details)

required_parameters.name: propertyId
required_parameters.description: The id of the property listing to return

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://realty-mole-property-api.p.rapidapi.com/rentalListings/{propertyid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "realty-mole-property-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Property Sale Listing by Id
api_list.description: Returns a single property sale listing matching the specified id, if it exists. Property ids can be obtained via the `/properties`, `/saleListings` or `/rentalListings` endpoints. [More info.](https://rapidapi.com/realtymole/api/realty-mole-property-api/details)

required_parameters.name: propertyId
required_parameters.description: The id of the property listing to return

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://realty-mole-property-api.p.rapidapi.com/saleListings/{propertyid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "realty-mole-property-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Property Record by Id
api_list.description: Returns a single property record matching the specified id, if it exists. Property ids can be obtained via the `/properties`, `/saleListings` or `/rentalListings` endpoints. [More info.](https://rapidapi.com/realtymole/api/realty-mole-property-api/details)

required_parameters.name: propertyId
required_parameters.description: The id of the property record to return

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://realty-mole-property-api.p.rapidapi.com/properties/{propertyid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "realty-mole-property-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Property Records
api_list.description: Search for property records in a geographical area, or around a specific address. Returns the property features, owner details, tax assessment, and other property information. [More info.](https://rapidapi.com/realtymole/api/realty-mole-property-api/details)

optional_parameters.name: bathrooms
optional_parameters.description: The number of bathrooms, used to search for properties matching this criteria. Supports fractions to indicate partial bathrooms

optional_parameters.name: propertyType
optional_parameters.description: The type of the property, used to search for properties matching this criteria. Supported values are: `Single Family`, `Condo`, `Townhouse`, `Manufactured`, `Duplex-Triplex`, `Apartment`, `Land`

optional_parameters.name: latitude
optional_parameters.description: The latitude of the search area. Use the `latitude`/`longitude` and `radius` parameters to search for properties in a specific area

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The index of the first property record to return, used to paginate through large lists of results. Defaults to 0 if not provided

optional_parameters.name: city
optional_parameters.description: The name of the city, used to search for properties in a specific city

optional_parameters.name: state
optional_parameters.description: The 2-character state abbreviation, used to search for properties in a specific state

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of property records to return, between 1 and 500. Defaults to 50 if not provided

optional_parameters.name: zipCode
optional_parameters.description: The 5-digit zip code, used to search for properties in a specific zip code

optional_parameters.name: bedrooms
optional_parameters.description: The number of bedrooms, used to search for properties matching this criteria

optional_parameters.name: longitude
optional_parameters.description: The longitude of the search area. Use the `latitude`/`longitude` and `radius` parameters to search for properties in a specific area

optional_parameters.name: address
optional_parameters.description: The address of the property, in the format of 'Street, City, State, Zip'. Used to retrieve data for a specific property, or together with the `radius` parameter to search for properties in a specific area
optional_parameters.default: 5500 Grand Lake Dr, San Antonio, TX, 78244

optional_parameters.name: radius
optional_parameters.description: The radius of the search area, in kilometers. Use in combination with the `latitude`/`longitude` or `address` parameters to search for properties in a specific area

api_list.name: Property Rent Estimate
api_list.description: Returns a rent estimate and comparable rental listings for an address or lat/long coordinate. Providing property feature parameters will improve the estimate accuracy. [More info.](https://rapidapi.com/realtymole/api/realty-mole-property-api/details)

optional_parameters.name: squareFootage
optional_parameters.description: The total living area size of the property, in square feet

optional_parameters.name: bedrooms
optional_parameters.description: The number of bedrooms in the property

optional_parameters.name: longitude
optional_parameters.description: The longitude of the property. The `latitude`/`longitude` can be provided instead of the `address` parameter

optional_parameters.name: propertyType
optional_parameters.description: The type of the property. Supported values are: `Single Family`, `Condo`, `Townhouse`, `Manufactured`, `Duplex-Triplex`, `Apartment`

optional_parameters.name: address
optional_parameters.description: The property address, in the format of 'Street, City, State, Zip'. You need to provide either the `address` or the `latitude`/`longitude` parameters
optional_parameters.default: 5500 Grand Lake Drive, San Antonio, TX, 78244

optional_parameters.name: maxRadius
optional_parameters.description: The maximum distance between comparable listings and the subject property, in kilometers. Defaults to 50 if not provided

optional_parameters.name: bathrooms
optional_parameters.description: The number of bathrooms in the property. Supports fractions to indicate partial bathrooms

optional_parameters.name: daysOld
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of days since comparable listings were last seen on the market, with a minimum of 1

optional_parameters.name: compCount
optional_parameters.description: The number of comparable listings returned by the API, between 5 and 25. Defaults to 10 if not provided

optional_parameters.name: latitude
optional_parameters.description: The latitude of the property. The `latitude`/`longitude` can be provided instead of the `address` parameter

listings.formattedAddress: 6907 Twin Lake Dr, San Antonio, TX 78244
6831 Quail Lake Dr, San Antonio, TX 78244
6818 Blue Lake Dr, San Antonio, TX 78244
6831 Blue Lake Dr, San Antonio, TX 78244

api_list.name: Random Property Records
api_list.description: Returns a list of property records selected at random up to the specified limit, to facilitate applications requiring samples of randomly selected property data. [More info.](https://rapidapi.com/realtymole/api/realty-mole-property-api/details)

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The number of records to return, between 1 and 500. Defaults to 10 if not provided

api_list.name: Rental Market Data
api_list.description: Returns rental data for a single US zip code, including rent averages, rental listing composition, and historical rent trends. [More info.](https://rapidapi.com/realtymole/api/realty-mole-property-api/details)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://realty-mole-property-api.p.rapidapi.com/zipCodes/{zipcode}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "realty-mole-property-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Property Value Estimate
api_list.description: Returns a property value estimate and comparable sale listings for an address or lat/long coordinate. Providing property feature parameters will improve the estimate accuracy. [More info.](https://rapidapi.com/realtymole/api/realty-mole-property-api/details)

optional_parameters.name: bedrooms
optional_parameters.description: The number of bedrooms in the property

optional_parameters.name: daysOld
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of days since comparable listings were last seen on the market, with a minimum of 1

optional_parameters.name: bathrooms
optional_parameters.description: The number of bathrooms in the property. Supports fractions to indicate partial bathrooms

optional_parameters.name: maxRadius
optional_parameters.description: The maximum distance between comparable listings and the subject property, in kilometers. Defaults to 50 if not provided

optional_parameters.name: latitude
optional_parameters.description: The latitude of the property. The `latitude`/`longitude` can be provided instead of the `address` parameter

optional_parameters.name: squareFootage
optional_parameters.description: The total living area size of the property, in square feet

optional_parameters.name: propertyType
optional_parameters.description: The type of the property. Supported values are: `Single Family`, `Condo`, `Townhouse`, `Manufactured`, `Duplex-Triplex`, `Apartment`, `Land`

optional_parameters.name: longitude
optional_parameters.description: The longitude of the property. The `latitude`/`longitude` can be provided instead of the `address` parameter

optional_parameters.name: address
optional_parameters.description: The property address, in the format of 'Street, City, State, Zip'. You need to provide either the `address` or the `latitude`/`longitude` parameters
optional_parameters.default: 5500 Grand Lake Drive, San Antonio, TX, 78244

optional_parameters.name: compCount
optional_parameters.description: The number of comparable listings returned by the API, between 5 and 25. Defaults to 10 if not provided
